markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Nanite Shroud](/Feats.aspx?ID=2469) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Android" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=334" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 73 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your nanites fly out of your body, swarming around you in a cloud. You become [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) for a number of rounds equal to half your level. You can't use this concealment to [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62) or [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=63), as normal for concealment that makes your position obvious. While Nanite Shroud is active, you can't use other abilities that require the use of your nanites.
name: Nanite Shroud

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 5" pfs="Standard" > Nanite Shroud Two Actions Source Ancestry Guide pg. 73 2.0 --- Your nanites fly out of your body, swarming around you in a cloud. You become concealed for a number of rounds equal to half your level. You can't use this concealment to Hide or Sneak, as normal for concealment that makes your position obvious. While Nanite Shroud is active, you can't use other abilities that require the use of your nanites.
